name: Lauren Price
bio:
Lauren Price, also known by her nicknames [], is a force to be reckoned with in the boxing world. Standing at 167cm tall and weighing in at 75kg, she competes in the middleweight weight class. But it's not just her physical attributes that make her a formidable opponent - her southpaw stance adds an extra element of unpredictability to her fights.

Price's journey to becoming a top-ranked boxer has been an impressive one. Born and raised in Wales, she was a multi-talented athlete from a young age, excelling in both boxing and football. In fact, she represented her country in football at the youth level before fully dedicating herself to the sweet science.

Price's decision to pursue boxing as a career has certainly paid off. She has quickly risen through the ranks, gaining recognition and accolades along the way. In 2014, she won the gold medal at the Commonwealth Games in Glasgow, making history as the first Welsh woman to achieve this feat in boxing.

Her success continued at the European Games in 2019, where she won the gold medal in the middleweight division. This victory solidified her status as one of the top fighters in her weight class. Price's skill and determination are evident in every bout she steps into the ring for.

One of Price's greatest strengths is her ability to adapt and strategize during a fight. As a southpaw, she poses a unique challenge for her opponents. Her unconventional stance often catches her rivals off guard, allowing her to land powerful punches and avoid incoming blows.

Price's skill set is not limited to her stance, though. She possesses impressive footwork, which enables her to move around the ring with agility and precision. Her defensive capabilities are equally outstanding, as she can effectively block and evade her opponents' attacks.

But it's not just her physical attributes that make Price a formidable competitor. She possesses an unwavering mental fortitude that allows her to stay focused and composed under pressure. This mental resilience has played a crucial role in her success, as boxing is as much a mental game as it is a physical one.

Outside of the ring, Price is known for her dedication to giving back to her community. She serves as an ambassador for several charities and encourages young people to pursue their dreams, regardless of the challenges they may face. Her story is an inspiration to many, and she continues to be a role model both inside and outside of the boxing world.

As Price continues to evolve as a boxer, it will be exciting to see what the future holds for her. She has proven time and time again that she is a force to be reckoned with in the middleweight division. With her combination of skill, determination, and mental fortitude, there's no doubt that she will continue to make waves in the boxing world for years to come.
